## ViraCut MVP Constitution Compliance

- [ ] CHK001 Radical Minimalism: Feature is essential with zero bloat
- [ ] CHK002 Performance-First: Meets < 3s TTI on 3G, 60fps, < 100ms touch
- [ ] CHK003 Atomic Design: Uses component-based architecture
- [ ] CHK004 Strict Architecture: Maintains layer separation
- [ ] CHK005 Data Integrity: Implements auto-save and validation

## Performance Validation

- [ ] CHK006 Time to Interactive measured under 3 seconds on 3G
- [ ] CHK007 Canvas rendering maintains 60fps on target devices
- [ ] CHK008 Touch response time under 100ms for all interactions
- [ ] CHK009 Auto-save completes within 500ms without UI interruption
- [ ] CHK010 Component load time under 100ms for atomic elements

## Code Quality

- [ ] CHK011 Components follow atomic design principles
- [ ] CHK012 Canvas state properly isolated from other layers
- [ ] CHK013 Node configuration separated from project state
- [ ] CHK014 Error handling prevents data loss scenarios
